trans-unit.source: An ASP.NET HTTP handler that processes a request for a Web services discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 一个处理对 Web 服务发现文档的请求的 ASP.NET HTTP 处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class, via its <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, processes an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler>类，通过其<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法，处理发现文档的 HTTP 请求。

trans-unit.source: A discovery document is represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> class and is usually serialized as a file using a .disco extension.
trans-unit.target: 发现文档由<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>类，通常会将其序列化为使用.disco 扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: Web services discovery provides a mechanism for determining the Web services that are available at a given location.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务发现提供用于确定在给定位置的 Web 服务的机制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class normally does not need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler>类通常不需要由开发人员直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value of <see langword="true" />, indicates whether the instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler" /> (or a derived class) is reusable.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see langword="true" /> 值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler" />（或派生类）的实例是否可以重用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.Request" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.Response" /> properties of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> class are used for input and output, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.Request" /> 类的 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.Response" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 属性分别用于输入和输出。

trans-unit.source: Handles an HTTP request for a discovery document, which is serialized to the HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 处理对某个发现文档的 HTTP 请求，该发现文档被序列化为 HTTP 响应。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method searches for applicable files within the file system path corresponding to the HTTP request's Uniform Resource Locator (URL).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法搜索适用文件内相应到 HTTP 请求的统一资源定位器 (URL) 的文件系统路径。

trans-unit.source: The search may extend to subdirectories and switch target file extensions depending on what it finds in the root search directory.
trans-unit.target: 搜索可能将扩展到子目录和切换目标文件扩展名，具体取决于它在根搜索目录中找到。

trans-unit.source: The search process populates the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> object's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A> property with files that are found.
trans-unit.target: 搜索过程填充<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>对象的<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A>使用找到的文件的属性。
